review: Already had used Google Chromecast before, I love how simple it really is though. "Hardest" part about it is setting it up. It really isn't at all actually. I am actually casting some Google music to my TV right now! It is a useful little tool for hosting parties and playing music, watching whatever you want on whatever device to your TV without wires. Make sure you have Wi-Fi though, it isn't run off of bluetooth unfortunately! haha can you imagine? Anyways, I would recommend to anyone.
